mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_AUTH, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_EMAIL FROM "TB_MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
